data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Saldaitis, Aidas, Benedek, Balázs (2017): Irene litanga, a new genus and new species in the Polia generic-complex from China (Lepidoptera, Noctuidae, Hadeninae, Hadenini). Zootaxa 4238 (2): 275-280, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4238.2.9|3 occurrences
